newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Portugal construction investment to grow in 1996.
newsitem.headline: Portugal construction investment to grow in 1996.

text.p: Total investment in Portugal's construction industry will grow by one percent in 1996 as a result of strong public investment, the Association of Public Works Contractors (ANEOP) said in its August report.
Public investment in construction will grow by 18.5 percent while private investment is expected to fall 8.6 percent, ANEOP said.
In 1995 public investment grew 6.9 percent and private investment increased 15.4 percent.

"Public investment in the second half will continue strong and will be up 21 percent on the same period last year compared with the 15.2 percent year-on-year increase in the first half of this year," the report said.
